title: Georgia, Ohio State, UNC and Auburn Start Camp
description:
Wendi Nix, Andre Ware and Matt Stinchcomb discuss the expectations for the defending champion Georgia Bulldogs as they start Fall camp. Plus, what to expect from Ryan Day and the Ohio State Buckeyes heading into this season. Hear UNC's defensive coordinator Gene Chizik mic'd up on the practice field and the crew also answers the question on whether Spencer Rattler could be a Heisman hopeful once again.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live crew previews the start of camp for the defending champion Georgia Bulldogs and much more
